summary: An Ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of The City of Seattle in the aggregate sum of Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($500,000), for the purpose of providing fund for the improvement of parks, parkways and playgrounds, authorized at an election held in The City of Seattle March 5th, 1912, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 28753, and directing the issuance of such bonds in the sum of Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($500,000), and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
